isis.stitle: INTERNATIONAL® VT 365 DIESEL ENGINE - MANIFOLDS AND EXHAUST GAS RECIRCULATION (EGR) - Installation - Intake Manifold/EGR Cooler

step1.para: Install a new front module seal between the intake manifold and front cover module.

figure.caption: Figure 89. Intake manifold gasket with centering tab

step1.para: Place intake manifold gasket onto each side of intake manifold and run a few bolts through to hold gasket in place. Make sure centering tabs are facing up into the manifold, while positioned inboard towards the engine valley.
Remove Intake Port Covers from cylinder head intake ports.

figure.caption: Figure 90. Installation of intake manifold and EGR cooler assembly

step1.para: Position intake manifold on cylinder heads.

figure.caption: Figure 91. Torque sequence for intake manifold mounting bolts

step1.para: Install the 16 intake manifold bolts in their correct locations . Use the following bolt torque sequence .

item.para: Torque bolts numbers 9 -16 to the special torque value .
Torque all M6 x 95 bolts to the special torque value .

figure.caption: Figure 92. Heat shield mounting nuts (right side)

step1.para: Install intake heat shield and two M6 x 1 nuts onto the right side of the intake manifold and tighten to the special torque .

figure.caption: Figure 94. Connecting EGR coolant inlet coupling to coolant supply port

calloutgroup.callout1: Index feature on EGR coolant supply cover

step1.para: Connect the EGR coolant inlet coupling by aligning the dual index marks (if visible) or flat edge of coupling with index feature on EGR coolant supply cover.

Slide EGR coolant inlet coupling onto coolant supply port and rotate coupling either way until single index mark (if visible) or recess aligns with index feature on EGR coolant supply cover . Attempt to slide EGR coolant inlet coupling off coolant supply port to verify locked position.
